channel.title: Web and App Development
channel.description:
I am a contract web and software developer with [decades of experience](http://www.linkedin.com/in/bntlyd). I give free consultations and discounts on projects that benefit the world, especially in the OGM areas on collective knowledge and sense making. Find a time for us to discuss over video at [BentleyDavis.com/schedule](https://BentleyDavis.com/schedule).
Bentley [BentleyDavis.com](https://BentleyDavis.com)

item.title: Web and App Development
item.dc:creator: Technoshaman
item.description:
hi Bentley,

I felt intrigued by your kind opening the door for a conversation about your possible involvement with projects “that benefit the world, especially in the OGM areas on collective knowledge and sense-making.” Here’s a brief introduction to mine, which is an unfunded project "open-source-oriented project and I can’t yet afford to pay developer prices for putting together the platform, even if it won’t have to be built from-the-scratch but drawing on innovative combinations available pieces. (I also wrote about it here.)

Please take a look and tell me whether SymmaSys would qualify and if yes, let’s chat.

Read full topic
